response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product offers unparalleled capabilities that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $15,000. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.", "product_price": 12000}
